name: recastjs
description: A wrapper for the RecastDetour navigation library for node and the browser

scripts.buildpoc: browserify poc/index.js -d -t [ babelify --sourceMaps=inline --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ syntax-async-functions transform-async-to-generator ] ] -o poc/browser.index.js
scripts.test: cd tests && find . -name 'test.*.js' -exec ../node_modules/.bin/nodeunit --reporter=verbose {} \; && echo all test passed

author: Vincent Lark <vincent.lark@gmail.com>
